createwiki-defaultmainpage:
{{doc-important|Do not translate "Miraheze"}}

Default Main Page for all wikis created.
createwiki-desc: An extension to easily create new wikis on a wiki farm.
createwiki-email-subject:
{{doc-important|Do not translate "Miraheze"}}

Email subject (if wiki requester has a registered email).
createwiki-email-body:
{{doc-important|Do not translate "Miraheze"}}

Email body (if wiki requester has a registered email).
createwiki-error-dbexists: Used as error message when the database being created already exists.
createwiki-error-requesternonexistent:
{{doc-important|Do not translate "Miraheze"}}

Used as error message when the user account for the requester cannot be found.
createwiki-error-notalnum: Used as error message when the database name entered does not contain non-alphanumeric characters.
createwiki-error-notlowercase: Used as error message when the database name entered contains uppercase letters.
createwiki-error-notsuffixed: Used as error message when the database name enter does not contain the 'wiki' suffix.
createwiki-error-usernotcreated: Used as error message when the user who requested the wiki was not created on the wiki.
createwiki-label-category:
Used as a label for category.
{{Identical|Category}}
createwiki-label-dbname:
Used as a label for dbname.
{{Identical|Database name}}
createwiki-label-private: Used as a label for to mark the wiki as private.
createwiki-label-submit:
Used as a label for submitting.
{{Identical|Submit}}
createwiki-success: Message when a wiki has successfully been created.
requestwiki-error-csrf: Loss of session data error message.
requestwiki-error-invalidcomment: Invalid comment/character based on blacklist error message.
requestwiki-error-nodomain: Erorr message if the user has not chosen a subdomain or a domain.
requestwiki-error-notallfilledin: Error message if not all fields have been filled in.
requestwiki-error-notime: Error message if the request could not be processed.
requestwiki-error-patient:
Multiple wiki requests in the same hour error message.

Wiki creator is a users with a userright.
requestwiki-error-twodomains: Erorr message if the user has chosen both a custom domain and a subdomain.
requestwiki-header:
{{doc-important|Do not translate "Miraheze"}}

Header which explains the process of requesting wikis.
requestwiki-label-customdomain: Used as a label for 'custom domain'
requestwiki-notloggedin: Error message if user tries to request a wiki while not being logged in.
requestwiki-success: Message after a wiki request has been sent successfully.
requestwikiqueue-norequests: Message when no requests following a query have been found
requestwikiqueue-request-header-changest: Button to change the status of a wiki request.
requestwikiqueue-request-header-wikicrea: Text for user who wrote the comment ($1)
requestwikiqueue-request-label-inreview: Used as a label for 'in review'
requestwikiqueue-request-label-status-co:
Used as a label for 'status colon
{{Identical|Status}}
requestwikiqueue-request-status: Button to change the status of a wiki request.
requestwikiqueue-requestnotfound: The searched wiki request was not found message.
requestwikiqueue-usernotfound: The search user was not found message
